ClassDescription: an organization that provides services, or that makes or sells goods for money
an educational institution is a place where people of different ages gain an education.
someone who makes paintings, sculptures etc
someone who is good at sports, especially athletics, and takes part in sports competitions
someone who has an important official position in an organization or in the government
any of the different kinds of transport facilities used to carry people or cargo
a structure made of a strong material such as stone or wood that has a roof and walls, for example a house
all places occurring naturally in universe.
a very small town in the countryside
any living thing that can move independently and that has senses for recognizing and reacting to the environment around it.
a living thing that grows in soil, has leaves and roots, and needs water and light from the sun to live
a collection of several songs or pieces of music recorded as an MP3 file, on a CD etc
a series of moving pictures with sound that you can watch at the cinema or at home
any text written to read it (e.g.: books, newspaper, articles)
